Assorted Updates - October 03, 2019

Things done today

Almost same as yesterday, I completed day 4 of the #JavaScript30 challenge. I completed another chapter of EloquentJS.

So today we also started preparing for this event we’re planning around Hacktoberfest. We’re planning a local event here in Guwahati(my hometown and where I’m currently staying) where we’ll guide first time open source contributors . We also have a page up Hacktoberfest’19 Guwahati with the details.
